snippet: While much of the blame for the Red Sox’ disappointing season has been directed at Bobby Valentine, injuries and bad games have plagued the team all season.
abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column maintains that while much of the blame for the Boston Red Sox disappointing season has been directed at manager Bobby Valentine, injuries and bad games have plagued the team all season.
lead_paragraph: While much of the blame for the Red Sox’ disappointing season has been directed at Bobby Valentine, injuries and bad games have plagued the team all season.

headline.seo: Of Red Sox’ Many Problems, Injuries Have Hurt Most
headline.main: Of Red Sox’ Many Problems, Injuries Have Hurt Most
headline.print_headline: Of Red Sox’ Many Problems, Injuries Have Hurt the Most
